posts.text: 快速笔记 将视频压缩为 720p 123ffmpeg -i xx.mp4 -c copy -c:v libx264 -vf scale=-2:720 xx_720.mp4ffmpeg -i xx.avi -vf scale="720:-1" xx.avi 将 mov 转为 mp4 1ffmpeg -i xx.mov -qscale 0 xx.mp4 html to jsxMore info html-to-jsx 视频自动播放 12345678910111213const playPromise = video.play();// set video mutedvideo.muted = true;video.setAttribute('muted', 'muted');if (playPromise !== undefined) { playPromise .then(() => { console.info('Automatic playback started!'); }) .catch(() => { console.info('Automatic playback failed!'); });} 参考: can-autoplay ES6 检查 CanIuseeslint-plugin-es5 CSS transition 属性 transition es6_arrays 1234Array.from()Array.keys()Array.find()Array.findIndex() es6_arrays loading more

posts.title: Hello World
posts.text: Welcome to Hexo! This is your very first post. Check documentation for more info. If you get any problems when using Hexo, you can find the answer in troubleshooting or you can ask me on GitHub. Quick StartCreate a new post1$ hexo new "My New Post" More info: Writing Run server1$ hexo server More info: Server Generate static files1$ hexo generate More info: Generating Deploy to remote sites1$ hexo deploy More info: Deployment
